item.description:
Continuing with the Goethe-Institut Boston's partnership with the Coolidge featuring German Cinema is "Porno! Melo! Drama!" Admission for all films in the series (running through May) is $5.

About the film:
Three exotic women, from completely different cultural backgrounds, are the best kind of friends. In a modern-day dream world, where princesses may be descending from a myth, they have to battle personal demons in their desperate quest for intimacy.

Born in Seoul, Korea, Heesook Sohn immigrated to Los Angeles at the age of 11. After acquiring a Bachelors degree in Fine Arts at the School of Visual Arts in New York in 1994, she relocated to Berlin, where she studied both screenwriting and directing at the German National Film and TV Academy (DFFB). Completed in 2007, ?Porno! Melo! Drama!? is Heesook Sohn?s first feature-length film.

After the film we'll go to an area restaurant for a discussion.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be holding a Meetup sign after the film.
item.name: Porno! Melo! Drama!
